predicate.note: Frames file for 'moderate' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

role.descr: thing that would be extreme otherwise

example.name: agentive
example.text: Some climate models project that interior regions of Asia would be among the first to heat up in a global warming because they are far from oceans, which *trace* moderate temperature changes.

example.name: ergative
example.text: At the same time, last week's consumer price index showed that inflation is moderating.
